title: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: If the key is left blank, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart.
OB: When the key in the properties file is left blank, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title when the key is not blank in the properties file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Set a valid value for the key in the properties file. 2. Verify that the externalized text is displayed in the chart title.
